attributes.action: pass a law that all domestic cats be neutered/spayed as early as possible, unless medically advised not to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rescues are full to capacity and turning cats and kittens away. Irresponsible owners are adding to this congestion by not having their cats neutered. Add to this the problem of unneutered strays and ferals and you have a serious over population issue.
